Eagle Strike Medium Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Eagle Strike Medium Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Eagle Strike Armour Set: 
 
 1. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 2. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Boots 
 3. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Gloves 
 4. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Helmet 
 5. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure moyenne Eagle Strike, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Eagle Strike complet : 
 
 1. Eagle Strike - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 2. Eagle Strike - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 3. Eagle Strike - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 4. Eagle Strike - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 5. Eagle Strike - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Eagle Strike; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Eagle Strike-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Eagle Strike - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 2. Eagle Strike - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 3. Eagle Strike - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 4. Eagle Strike - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 5. Eagle Strike - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe [#Legal]

Set completo di armature d'assalto medio Eagle Strike, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Eagle Strike: 
 
 1. Eagle Strike - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 2. Eagle Strike - stivali d'assalto medio 
 3. Eagle Strike - guanti d'assalto medio 
 4. Eagle Strike - casco d'assalto medio 
 5. Eagle Strike - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio [#Legal]

El set completo de Armadura media Eagle Strike, contiene las 5 partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Eagle Strike - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 2. Eagle Strike - Botas de asalto medias 
 3. Eagle Strike - Guantes de asalto medios 
 4. Eagle Strike - Casco de asalto medio 
 5. Eagle Strike - Armadura de asalto media para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 독수리의 일격 중형 방어구 세트입니다. 독수리의 일격 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 독수리의 일격 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 독수리의 일격 - 중형 돌격부츠 (남성)
 3. 독수리의 일격 - 중형 돌격장갑 (남성)
 4. 독수리의 일격 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (남성)
 5. 독수리의 일격 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

The complete Eagle Strike Medium Armor Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Eagle Strike Armor Set:
 
 1. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Body Armor (Men)
 2. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Boots (Men)
 3. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Gloves (Men)
 4. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Helmet (Men)
 5. Eagle Strike - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Men) [#Legal]

全套飛鷹突擊中型裝甲服裝組，當中包括服裝組中全部5個部分：
 
 1. 飛鷹突擊 - 中型突擊護甲(男用) 
 2. 飛鷹突擊 - 中型突擊靴子(男用) 
 3. 飛鷹突擊 - 中型突擊手套(男用) 
 4. 飛鷹突擊 - 中型突擊頭盔(男用) 
 5. 飛鷹突擊 - 中型突擊護脛(男用) [#Legal]

 1. 飛鷹突擊 - 中型突擊護甲(男用)
